articles.description: Two sets of scientists are debating how smart the ancient reptile T-rex was, based on the size of its brain and the number of brain cells it might have had.
articles.content:
A group of scientists has disputed a study published last year that estimated the intelligence of the dinosaur Tyrannosaurus rex to be similar to a baboons.
The group disputed last years report from… [+3549 chars]
